repairedDockerfile:
from ubuntu:13.10 
MAINTAINER Johnny Bergstr√∂m <docker@joonix.se> 

# Stop complaining about trying to show a dialog for configuration input 
ENV DEBIAN_FRONTEND noninteractive 

# Helper for adding ppa's 
RUN apt-get install --no-install-recommends -y python-software-properties software-properties-common && rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/*;

# Official i2p ppa 
RUN add-apt-repository ppa:i2p-maintainers/i2p 
RUN apt-get update && apt-get install --no-install-recommends -y i2p && rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/*;

# Add configuration that will let non-localhost connect to the web interface 
ADD config /root/.i2p 

CMD ["/usr/bin/i2prouter", "launchdinternal"] 

# Web interface 
EXPOSE 7657 
# HTTP proxy 
EXPOSE 4444 
# For incoming connections 
EXPOSE 13768
